医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
脊髓损伤修复的新组织工程策略最近发表在《工程学》杂志上的一项研究深入研究了组织工程在脊髓损伤（SCI）修复中的应用，对最新研究和潜在治疗策略进行了全面综述。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-tissue-eentegring-strategies-for-spinal-cord-injury-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-tissue-eentering-strategies-for-spinal-cord-injury-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94a3b8ae-f824-4b999999999-9147-1c819df5608c Wed, 12 Mar 2025 21:21:29 -0400 New tissue engineering strategies for spinal cord injury repair
饮食更多的卡路里如何有助于降低儿童的哮喘风险 - 但只有一点点消耗较高饮食能量的美国儿童和青少年的哮喘风险较低，但是这种保护作用停止了每天每公斤体重的56.442 kcal。该研究发现了L形的关系，表明能量摄入不足可能会增加哮喘风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/how-eating-more-calories-helps-helps-nelps-lower-asthma-asthma-casthma-risk-in-children-children-children---------------in-children-bolly-polly-polly-polly-point.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/How-eating-more-calories-helps-lower-asthma-risk-in-children-but-only-up-to-a-point.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cb7cbbb-5A66-4EB2-8341-B839806EB070 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 21:05:00 -0400 How eating more calories helps lower asthma risk in children - but only up to a point
研究人员发现195个遗传危险因素驱动妇女生殖疾病科学家确定了在42位女性生殖健康状况中的195个遗传风险基因座，揭示了共同的遗传途径并为肝内怀孕（ICP）增长多基因风险评分。这些发现为基于遗传风险的个性化生殖保健和靶向治疗铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/researchers-uncover-195-genetic-risk-factors-driving-womene28099s- reprapropoductive-diseasees.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/researchers-uncover-195-genetic-risk-factors-driving-womene28099s- reprapropoductive-diseasees.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd9729bb-0846-427e-80bb-879215b0227a Wed, 12 Mar 2025 20:28:00 -0400 Researchers uncover 195 genetic risk factors driving women’s reproductive diseases
苹果果皮击败一些糖尿病药物，以阻止血糖尖峰研究人员发现，来自局部和商业品种的苹果果皮富含具有抗氧化剂和抗糖尿病特性的酚类化合物。局部品种Amarilla de Octubre显示出最高的生物活性，这表明了营养和药物应用的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/apple-peels-beat-some-diabetes-diabetes-drugs-at-blocking--blocking-------------- an-at-blocking-blocking-sugar-spikes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/apple-peels-beat-some-diabetes-daibetes-drugs-at-blocking--blocking--blocking-sugar-sugar-spikes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fbcce9C-371B-45D3-B8B8-8B8-8AFE471112F4 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 20:06:00 -0400 Apple peels beat some diabetes drugs at blocking blood sugar spikes
红肉可以帮助女性提高铁水平吗？新研究表明适度的好处对10项干预研究的系统综述和荟萃分析发现，增加的红肉消耗可改善成年人，尤其是女性的血红蛋白水平，但需要≥8周才能适度提高铁蛋白，尽管与铁补充剂相比，临床相关性仍然不确定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/can-red-meat-help-women-inmen-improve-rirvel-rirvels-new-study-suggests-suggests-modest-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/can-red-meat-help-women-inmen-improve-irn-level-new-study-suggests-modest-modest-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bb468db-0eb8-413a-413a-a621-803a81dae5f8 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 19:16:00 -0400 Can red meat help women improve iron levels? New study suggests modest benefits
检查皮肤癌的风险感知和报道的美国成年人皮肤癌是美国最常见的癌症，也是一个重大的健康问题，每年诊断出数百万的非黑色素瘤病例和成千上万的黑色素瘤。此外，治疗皮肤癌每年花费约89亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/examining-skin-cancer-risk-pocteions-and-reported-sunburns-sunburns-among-us-usts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/examining-skin-cancer-risk-perceptions-and-reported-sunburns-sunburns-among-us-usts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4e18e18e8f-fa15-44b5-44b5-860f-0a4d3f059a9b Wed, 12 Mar 2025 15:53:34 -0400 Examining skin cancer risk perceptions and reported sunburns among U.S. adults
晚期胸腺癌的新治疗选择显示胸腺上皮肿瘤是起源于胸腺的罕见的恶性肿瘤，其中包括胸腺瘤和胸腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-treatment-eatment-option-for-advanced-thymic-carcinamic-carcinoma-shows-promise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-treatment-poption-for-advanced-thymic-carcinamic-shows-shows-promise-promise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60677b25-C254-4F43-BDAF-66FF44926E85 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 14:57:18 -0400 New treatment option for advanced thymic carcinoma shows promise

雪冰饮料中的甘油会使儿童生病已经发现用甘油制成的泥冰饮料会使儿童生病。爱尔兰和英国的医生和医学科学家报告了与冰冷茶有关的疾病后进行了调查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/glycerol-in-in-slush-ice-ice-drinks-can-make-children-sick.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/glycerol-in-in-slush-ice-ice-drinks-can-make-children-sick.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de7dd23a-fd25-4576-8BC1-BDA0F82E20CF Wed, 12 Mar 2025 14:40:00 -0400 Glycerol in slush ice drinks can make children sick
早期的ACL手术可能会降低膝关节骨关节炎的风险HSS研究人员的一项临床前研究发现，与延迟手术相比，早期的前交叉韧带（ACL）重建导致免疫细胞活性降低，炎症较少，关节变化较少，而与膝关节骨关节炎相比，与膝关节骨关节炎相比较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/earlier-acl-surogery-may-redergery-may-reduce--risk-os-of-knee-osteoarhthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/earlier-acl-surogery-may-redergery-may-reduce--risk-ok-ok-ok-ok-osteoarthrothitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faf7cd12-6ff3-6ff3-4f6f-82db-0f97428d5751 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 13:31:57 -0400 Earlier ACL surgery may reduce risk of knee osteoarthritis
